00023 class KRawEvent : public KEvent {         
00024         
00025 public:
00026         //Constructors and destructor. Only Derived class and the Factory
00027         //SHOULD access these methods. 
00028         //However, in order for ROOT's I/O to work properly
00029         //the constructor and destructor
00030         //have to be public. Otherwise, I would have made them protected or private
00031         KRawEvent(void);
00032         KRawEvent(const KRawEvent &anEvent);
00033         virtual ~KRawEvent(void);
00034         KRawEvent& operator=(const KEvent &anEvent);
00035         KRawEvent& operator=(const KHLAEvent &anEvent);
00036         KRawEvent& operator=(const KRawEvent &anEvent);
00037         virtual void Clear(Option_t *opt = "C");
00038         Bool_t IsSame(const KRawEvent &anEvent, Bool_t bPrint = false) const;
00039         Bool_t operator==(const KRawEvent &anEvent) const { return IsSame(anEvent,false); }
00040         Bool_t operator!=(const KRawEvent &anEvent) const { return !(*this==anEvent); }
00041         virtual void Compact(void);
00042 private: 
00043         
00044         void InitializeMembers(void);
00045         void CopyLocalMembers(const KRawEvent &anEvent);
